title: 2018–19 Pyramids FC season
text:
The <a href="2018%E2%80%9319%20in%20Egyptian%20football">2018–19</a> <a href="Pyramids%20FC">Pyramids</a> season was the 10th season in the <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club's history and <a href="List%20of%20Egyptian%20Premier%20League%20clubs">2nd consecutive and 3rd overall season</a> in the top flight of <a href="Egyptian%20football%20league%20system">Egyptian football</a>, the <a href="Egyptian%20Premier%20League">Egyptian Premier League</a>, having been promoted from the <a href="Egyptian%20Second%20Division">Egyptian Second Division</a> in <a href="2016%E2%80%9317%20Egyptian%20Second%20Division">2017</a>. It was also the 1st season for the club under their new name, after being sold to new owners and renamed from Al Assiouty Sport to Pyramids Football Club. In addition to the domestic league, Pyramids also participated in this season's editions of the domestic cup, the <a href="Egypt%20Cup">Egypt Cup</a>. The season covered a period from 1 July 2018 to 30 June 2019; however Pyramids played their last match of the season in September 2019. 
Kit information.
Supplier: <a href="Kappa%20%28company%29">Kappa</a>
Sponsors: <a href="Saudia">Saudia</a>, Swyp
Competitions.
Egypt Cup.
Pyramids entered the competition from the round of 32 and were given a home tie against <a href="Tanta%20SC">Tanta</a>. Starting from the round of 16, all matches were played on stadiums selected by the <a href="Egyptian%20Football%20Association">Egyptian Football Association</a>.
